product_name: Werner Carve Adjustable Stand Up Paddle - Mid-Size Blade
long_description: Answer the call of the waves with the Werner Carve Stand Up Paddle. It features a mid-size fiberglass blade to fit a wide range of applications, and an adjustable length for multiple users. Suitable for multiple paddlers of different heights, the Werner Carve Adjustable Stand Up Paddle telescopes to fit 2 size ranges: 74 - 81.5 in. and 80 - 87.5 in. Lightweight fiberglass and carbon blend shaft offers light flex on every stroke and feels warm in your hands; oval shape of shaft increases overall control of the Werner Carve. Fiberglass-laminate blade provides lightweight power; long and slender profile turns responsively in surf and rough water. Long, rectangular blade offers nuanced power application; use the tip for a quick maneuverability and the entire blade for deep, forceful strokes. Reduced surface area takes it easy on your joints and offers a faster stroke cadence, allowing you to accelerate and maneuver quickly to catch more waves. Durable T-shaped ABS palm grip fits naturally in your hand, refining your control for a variety of paddle strokes. 2-piece design breaks down to make transport easy.
short_description: Answer the call of the waves with the Werner Carve Stand Up Paddle. It features a mid-size fiberglass blade to fit a wide range of applications, and an adjustable length for multiple users.
